definition[0]: a person, company, or country that sells goods to another country
example[0]: Japan is a leading exporter of textiles.
example[1]: With the expanded production of North Sea oil and gas, the UK has become a net exporter of fuel  (=it exports more fuel than it imports).
definition[1]: a person, company, or country that exports goods
example[2]: If the yen rose above 115 to the dollar, virtually every exporter in Japan would be losing money.
